text: Ezɨ dughiar kamɨn Jekop deraghavɨra aning damuasa bizir aghuiba isa aning ganɨga, kamaghɨn Josep mɨgei, “Gɨn izamin dughiamɨn, Israelia, God deraghvɨra igharaz darazi damusɨ an azangsɨgh, nɨn borimningɨn ziamning dɨponɨva mɨkɨm suam, God deravɨra Efraim ko Manase gamizɨ moghɨn, a deravɨra ia damuam.” Ezɨ arazir kamɨn Jekop Efraim faragha anetɨgha, Manase gɨn anetɨ.
